Description:
Ensure Overall SLA is monitored at order level.
Ensure order is Fulfilled and Delivered within the promised delivery timings
Last Mile Team are real in-touch agents with customers, Driver shall be presenting Boutiqaat’s image with the customers and shall receive trainings on such.
Manage filtration of returned orders; Rescheduled, no answer and Customer denied.
Organize Shipments in FIFO.
Perform Daily Shipment Aging Reports to ensure no delays.
Manage Sorting of shipments into Delivery Zones
Group relevant zones in case of zone doesn’t have enough shipments
Can divide a single zone to multiple drivers in case of high shipment availability in this zone.
Knowledge in Delivery Areas and Zones of the country/city of Operations.
Planning of distribution Routes.
Plan Shipments and Manage Handover to 3rd Party Logistics.
Oversee the activities of shipping and receiving.
Arranging and providing transport for all the request from other departments like; Transfer orders, urgent.
Orders and any external and internal request which are company related.
Ensures that non-delivered shipments are received back at station.
Ensures that non-delivered shipments are in good condition.
For Re-scheduled shipments, ensures that the Dispatch is as per the re-schedule date.
In Case of COD, ensures to collect the exact amount of CASH from the driver and check FAKE MONEY.
Organize received items into shipments and Cases.
Handover reverse logistics items in the same day to the dedicated returns team in Boutiqaat Warehouse(s).Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in business, operations management, or related field.
3-5 years experience in an operations management role.
Proven leadership and team-building skills.
Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
Highly organized with strong attention to detail.
